verses.verse: I am sought<WH1875> of them that asked<WH7592> not<WH3808> for me<WH4672>; I am found of them that sought<WH1245> me not<WH3808>: I said<WH559>, Behold me<WH1471>, behold me, unto a nation that was not called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>.

I have spread out<WH6566> my hands<WH3027> all the day<WH3117> unto a rebellious<WH5637> people<WH5971>, which walk<WH1980> in a way<WH1870> that was not good<WH2896>, after<WH310> their own thoughts<WH4284>;
A people<WH5971> that provokes me to anger<WH3707> continually<WH8548> to my face<WH6440>; that sacrifices<WH2076> in gardens<WH1593>, and burns incense<WH6999> upon altars of brick<WH3843>;

Which remain<WH3427> among the graves<WH6913>, and lodge<WH3885> in the monuments<WH5341>, which eat<WH398> swine<WH2386>'s flesh<WH1320>, and broth<WH4839> of abominable<WH6292> things is in their vessels<WH3627>;

Which say<WH559>, Stand<WH7126> by yourself<WH5066>, come not near to me<WH6942>; for I am holier than you<WH6227>. These are a smoke in my nose<WH639>, a fire<WH784> that burns<WH3344> all the day<WH3117>.
Behold<WH3789>, it is written before<WH6440> me<WH2814>: I will not keep silence, but will recompense<WH7999>, even recompense<WH7999> into their bosom<WH2436>,

Your iniquities<WH5771>, and the iniquities<WH5771> of your fathers<WH1> together<WH3162>, says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>, which have burned incense<WH6999> upon the mountains<WH2022>, and blasphemed<WH2778> me upon the hills<WH1389>: therefore will I measure<WH4058> their former<WH7223> work<WH6468> into their bosom<WH2436>.

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>, As the new wine<WH8492> is found<WH4672> in the cluster<WH811>, and one says<WH559>, Destroy<WH7843> it not<WH1293>; for a blessing is in it<WH6213>: so will I do for my servants<WH5650>' sakes<WH7843>, that I may not destroy them all.

And I will bring forth<WH3318> a seed<WH2233> out of Jacob<WH3290>, and out of Judah<WH3063> a inheritor<WH3423> of my mountains<WH2022>: and my elect<WH972> shall inherit<WH3423> it<WH5650>, and my servants shall live there<WH7931>.

And Sharon<WH8289> shall be a fold<WH5116> of flocks<WH6629>, and the valley<WH6010> of Achor<WH5911> a place for the herds<WH1241> to lie down in<WH7258>, for my people<WH5971> that have sought me<WH1875>.

But you are they that forsake<WH5800> the Lord<WH3068>, that forget<WH7913> my holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>, that prepare<WH6186> a table<WH7979> for that troop<WH1409>, and that furnish<WH4390> the drink offering<WH4469> unto that number<WH4507>.

Therefore will I number<WH4487> you to the sword<WH2719>, and you shall all bow down<WH3766> to the slaughter<WH2874>: because when I called<WH7121>, you did not answer<WH6030>; when I spoke<WH1696>, you did not hear<WH8085>; but did<WH6213> evil<WH7451> before my eyes<WH5869>, and did choose<WH977> that where I delighted not<WH2654>.

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>, Behold<WH5650>, my servants shall eat<WH398>, but you shall be hungry<WH7456>: behold<WH5650>, my servants shall drink<WH8354>, but you shall be thirsty<WH6770>: behold<WH5650>, my servants shall rejoice<WH8055>, but you shall be ashamed<WH954>:

Behold<WH5650>, my servants shall sing<WH7442> for joy<WH2898> of heart<WH3820>, but you shall cry<WH6817> for sorrow<WH3511> of heart<WH3820>, and shall howl<WH3213> for vexation<WH7667> of spirit<WH7307>.

And you shall leave<WH3240> your name<WH8034> for a curse<WH7621> unto my chosen<WH972>: for the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069> shall kill<WH4191> you<WH7121>, and call his servants<WH5650> by another<WH312> name<WH8034>:

That he who blesses<WH1288> himself in the earth<WH776> shall bless<WH1288> himself in the God<WH430> of truth<WH543>; and he that swears<WH7650> in the earth<WH776> shall swear<WH7650> by the God<WH430> of truth<WH543>; because the former<WH7223> troubles<WH6869> are forgotten<WH7911>, and because they are hid<WH5641> from my eyes<WH5869>.
For<WH1254>, behold, I create new<WH2319> heavens<WH8064> and a new<WH2319> earth<WH776>: and the former<WH7223> shall not be remembered<WH2142>, nor come<WH5927> into mind<WH3820>.
But be you glad<WH7797> and rejoice<WH1523> for ever<WH5703> in that which I create<WH1254>: for<WH1254>, behold, I create Jerusalem<WH3389> a rejoicing<WH1525>, and her people<WH5971> a joy<WH4885>.

And I will rejoice<WH1523> in Jerusalem<WH3389>, and joy<WH7797> in my people<WH5971>: and the voice<WH6963> of weeping<WH1065> shall be no more heard<WH8085> in her<WH6963>, nor the voice of crying<WH2201>.

There shall be no more there a infant<WH5764> of days<WH3117>, nor a old man<WH2205> that has not filled<WH4390> his days<WH3117>: for the child<WH5288> shall die<WH4191> a hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old<WH1121>; but the sinner<WH2398> being a hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> shall be accursed<WH7043>.
And they shall build<WH1129> houses<WH1004>, and inhabit<WH3427> them<WH5193>; and they shall plant vineyards<WH3754>, and eat<WH398> the fruit of them<WH6529>.

They shall not build<WH1129>, and another<WH312> inhabit<WH3427>; they shall not plant<WH5193>, and another<WH312> eat<WH398>: for as the days<WH3117> of a tree<WH6086> are the days<WH3117> of my people<WH5971>, and my elect<WH972> shall long enjoy<WH1086> the work<WH4639> of their hands<WH3027>.

They shall not labor<WH3021> in vain<WH7385>, nor bring forth<WH3205> for trouble<WH928>; for they are the seed<WH2233> of the blessed<WH1288> of the Lord<WH3068>, and their offspring with them<WH6631>.
And it shall come to pass<WH7121>, that before they call, I will answer<WH6030>; and while they are yet speaking<WH1696>, I will hear<WH8085>.

The wolf<WH2061> and the lamb<WH2924> shall feed<WH7462> together<WH259>, and the lion<WH738> shall eat<WH398> straw<WH8401> like the bullock<WH1241>: and dust<WH6083> shall be the serpent<WH5175>'s food<WH3899>. They shall not hurt<WH7489> nor destroy<WH7843> in all my holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>, says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>.
